marklogic.body: As a resident in Sanford I am not surprised by the crap that the MSM is running with because they are trying to make it seem as if it is "Mississippi Burning" down here and that is not even the case. We are more pissed Off at gas prices and trying to live our lives. Since the story first broke nationally I have been trying to tell people that whatever you are reading and watching on television is straight BS and don't believe it. I have to say the majority of the residence in Sanford have a good idea what happened and it is not fitting the narrative that has been given.
